trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.UserNameSecurityTokenHandler" /> that validates a <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.UserNameSecurityToken" /> by using a configured <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.UserNameSecurityTokenHandler" /> que valida um <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.UserNameSecurityToken" /> usando um <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider" /> configurado.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Services.Tokens.MembershipUserNameSecurityTokenHandler" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Services.Tokens.MembershipUserNameSecurityTokenHandler" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Services.Tokens.MembershipUserNameSecurityTokenHandler" /> class that uses the default membership provider that is configured for the application.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Services.Tokens.MembershipUserNameSecurityTokenHandler" /> que usa o provedor de associação padrão configurado para o aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: No default membership provider is configured for the application.
trans-unit.target: Nenhum provedor de associação padrão está configurado para o aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: The membership provider to use to validate tokens.
trans-unit.target: O provedor de associação a ser usado para validar tokens.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Services.Tokens.MembershipUserNameSecurityTokenHandler" /> class that uses the specified membership provider.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Services.Tokens.MembershipUserNameSecurityTokenHandler" /> que usa um provedor de associação especificado.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the current instance can validate security tokens of type <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.UserNameSecurityToken" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a instância atual pode validar tokens de segurança do tipo <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.UserNameSecurityToken" />.

trans-unit.source: Always <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: Sempre <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the token handler can validate user name security tokens; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o manipulador de token pode validar os tokens de segurança de nome de usuário; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Always <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: Sempre <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: The custom XML elements.
trans-unit.target: Os elementos XML personalizados.

trans-unit.source: Loads custom configuration from XML.
trans-unit.target: Carrega a configuração personalizada do XML.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider" /> that is configured for the current instance.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider" /> que está configurado para a instância atual.

trans-unit.source: The configured membership provider.
trans-unit.target: O provedor de associação configurado.

trans-unit.source: The security token to be validated.
trans-unit.target: O token de segurança a ser validado.

trans-unit.source: Validates the specified security token by using the configured <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider" />.
trans-unit.target: Valida o token de segurança especificado usando o <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider" /> configurado.

trans-unit.source: The identities that are contained in the token.
trans-unit.target: As identidades contidas no token.

trans-unit.source: The configured membership provider is referenced through the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Tokens.MembershipUserNameSecurityTokenHandler.MembershipProvider%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O provedor de associação configurado é referenciado por meio de <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Tokens.MembershipUserNameSecurityTokenHandler.MembershipProvider%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="token" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="token" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="token" /> is not an instance of <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.UserNameSecurityToken" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="token" /> não é uma instância de <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.UserNameSecurityToken" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="token" /> failed validation with the configured <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="token" /> falhou na validação com o <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider" /> configurado.
